snippet.title: Yakuza: Like a Dragon | Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Rise like a dragon.
    
Yakuza: Like a Dragon launches in the West later this year on Xbox Series X, Xbox One, Windows 10 PC, PlayStation 4, and Steam!
    
Become Ichiban Kasuga, a low-ranking yakuza grunt left on the brink of death by the man he trusted most. Take up your legendary bat and get ready to crack some underworld skulls in dynamic RPG combat set against the backdrop of modern-day Japan.
    
https://likeadragon.sega.com/home.html
